title: Losing Face
description: It happens to all of us: someone recognizes you on the street, calls you by name, and says hello... and you have no idea who that person is. Researchers say this struggle to read other faces is common. This week on Hidden Brain, super-recognizers, and the rest of us.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
